statement.tex: \text{The interval in which }y=x^2\cdot e^{-x}\text{ is}\\ increasing is \\ (a)\left(-\infty,\infty\right)\quad(b)\left(-2,0\right)\\ (c)\left(2,\infty\right)\quad (d)\left(0,2\right)

reason.tex: \text{Chain rule says that }\frac{d}{dx}f\cdot g = fg' + f'g\\ \text{Apply it with }f=x^2\text{ and }g=e^{-x}.
